name: A Spooky Stroll
description:
Please play on your web browser of choice for the best experience!There is a game breaking bug caused by RPGMaker's file naming conventions that ONLY OCCURS on theItch.io Desktop App!

Night is starting to fall, Em sets out to find some firewood for her hot tent stove.  

Get 100 wood  and bring it back to your tent.

Not like there is a spooky abandoned logging camp...

You can play this on mobile browsers, but the best experience will be with a keyboard!!!

Mobile: Touch portions of the map, and Em will run towards them automatic, and double tap for choice selection.

Keyboard: Arrow keys for movement, shift for sprint, space/z to confirm, x to cancel.

This was made  as a part of RPGMaker tutorial I made for the Portland Indie Game Squad Spooky Games Marathon . The concept was taking a cozy little experience gathering firewood, and make it spooOOOky! 

Any donations received for this will be donated back into the Portland Indie Game Squad!


The pixel font for this project was:  Curse by Somepx
